abstract: basf pt set at € 109.00 by deutsche bank .
article: basf received a € 109.00 price objective from stock analysts at deutsche bank in a research note issued to investors on thursday . the brokerage currently has a `` buy '' rating on the basic materials company 's stock . deutsche bank 's price target would suggest a potential upside of 14.92 % from the company 's previous close . several other research firms have also recently commented on bas . barclays set a € 97.00 target price on basf and gave the company a `` neutral '' rating in a research note on friday , november 3rd . set a € 85.00 target price on basf and gave the company a `` sell '' rating in a research note on wednesday , november 8th .

sanford c. bernstein set a € 72.00 target price on basf and gave the company a `` sell '' rating in a research note on monday , november 27th . baader bank set a € 100.00 target price on basf and gave the company a `` buy '' rating in a research note on monday , november 27th . finally , commerzbank set a € 90.10 target price on basf and gave the company a `` buy '' rating in a research note on friday , december 8th . three research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , eight have assigned a hold rating and twelve have issued a buy rating to the stock .

the company has an average rating of `` hold '' and a consensus target price of € 96.23 . shares of basf opened at € 94.85 on thursday . the company has a market capitalization of $ 87,120.00 and a price-to-earnings ratio of 16.67 . basf has a 52 week low of € 78.97 and a 52 week high of € 97.90 . copyright violation warning : this news story was originally posted by daily political and is the sole property of of daily political . if you are reading this news story on another domain , it was illegally stolen and republished in violation of u. s. & international copyright legislation .

the original version of this news story can be read at basfbasf se operates as a chemical company worldwide . it operates through five segments : chemicals , performance products , functional materials & solutions , agricultural solutions , and oil & gas . the chemicals segment offers solvents , plasticizers , monomers , and glues , as well as raw materials for detergents , plastics , textile fibers , paints and coatings , crop protection products , and medicines .
